hu.vadasz.peter.knockmessenger.Activities

Class MessageSendingActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • AppCompatActivity
      • hu.vadasz.peter.knockmessenger.Activities.BaseActivity
        • hu.vadasz.peter.knockmessenger.Activities.BaseActivityWithKnockDecoder
          • hu.vadasz.peter.knockmessenger.Activities.MessageSendingActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessageAdapter.MessageAdapterListener, MessageSendingController.MessageSendingControllerListener, ServerDataChangeHandler.FriendChangeListener, ServerDataChangeHandler.MessageReceivedListener, MessageSender.MessageSendingVisualizer

    public class MessageSendingActivity
extends BaseActivityWithKnockDecoder
implements MessageSender.MessageSendingVisualizer, MessageSendingController.MessageSendingControllerListener, ServerDataChangeHandler.FriendChangeListener, MessageAdapter.MessageAdapterListener, ServerDataChangeHandler.MessageReceivedListener
    Activity class to send messages. This class is responsible for request permissions for microphone and external storage.
